title: Inferential Statistics and Hypothesis Testing
activities: Completed hypothesis testing worksheet applying t‑tests, sample variance analysis, and two‑sample comparisons; worked through summary measures workbook; submitted literature review examining cloud computing's impact on banking cybersecurity.
skills: Gained competency in probability principles, hypothesis testing, and selecting appropriate probability distributions; developed ability to interpret statistical significance; strengthened critical synthesis through a literature review.
impact: Building on Unit 6's descriptive statistics, exploring inferential approaches gave me a means to make evidence‑based conclusions beyond observed data. My literature review demonstrated how quantitative and qualitative approaches can complement each other, integrating quantitative security metrics with qualitative expert perspectives.
